title: The Personification of Nature Making Birds, Animals, and People
description: The Personification of Nature Making Birds, Animals, and People; Unknown; Paris, France; about 1405; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with dark red morocco; Leaf: 36.7 × 26 cm (14 7/16 × 10 1/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 7, fol. 121v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
